sourcesContent:
import {useState, useEffect} from 'react' // rafce

const Controls = () => {
    const [wordLimit, setWordLimit] = useState(0)
    const rangeOnChangeHandler = (e) => {
        setWordLimit(e.target.value)
        console.log("change")
    }

    return (
        <section className="stories-controls">
            <section>
            <label for="words">Word Limit</label>
            <input onChange={rangeOnChangeHandler} type="range" step="3" value={wordLimit} name="words" min="0" max="500" />
            <label>{wordLimit}</label>
            </section>
            <section>
                <label>Sort</label>
                <select>
                    <option>Ascending</option>
                    <option>Descending</option>
                </select>
            </section>
        </section>
    )
}

export default Controls
